segments.text: Thank you . I am glad that you are enjoying it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where did you get your fantastic recipes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I grew up cooking . My mother shared her recipes with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I especially like the wonderful chicken dish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is a special coconut ginger chicken with rice dish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that shrimp in the soup ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , do you like it ? I added a little extra lemon grass and some sea vegetables .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am happy that the wine I brought for you works well with this meal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , thank you for bringing the wine . It really complements the meal .
segments.speaker: S2
